text:
NEW and exclusive:

Troll farms from Macedonia and the Philippines pushed coronavirus disinformation on Facebook

They're tied to the notorious disinformation peddlers Natural News, which is now banned from Facebook.

@BrandyZadrozny and I report:

 https://t.co/iZzS7Zl7cF

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19 misinformation
entity.description: This is a list of Tweets highlighting corrections to misinformation surrounding COVID-19 from experts, fact-checkers and journalists.
